name: Catalogo de la Municipalidad de San Ramon
description: Geoportal and spatial data catalog of the Municipalidad de San Ramon, providing access to interactive maps, satellite imagery, and related spatial databases.
owner_subregion_iso3166_2: CR-AL (Alajuela province, but not directly mapped in ISO 3166-2; ISO 3166-2:CR for 'San Ramón' is not defined, but the municipality is in Alajuela province)
data_themes: Base registries (if map/location data is considered base registry, otherwise use best match)
Government and public sector (general category for municipal data)
